description:
This software consists of LANL contributions to the pFUnit unit testing framework, developed and copyrighted by NASA/Goddard Space Flight Center.

pFUnit is a unit testing framework enabling JUnit-like testing of serial and MPI-parallel software written in Fortran.  The LANL contributions will consist of adding support for new platforms/compilers not currently supported (including IBM XL and Cray), and fixing bugs found in the process.
name: Contributions to pFUnit
